name: Computer Repair Shop (itch)
description:
A Game Made for the Global Game Jam 2020.

Spin components into place and repair as many pcs as you can to make a fortune.

Buy upgrades, unlock new parts and earn even more.

But watch out you only have so much time to repair the pcs.

Controls:

Mouse to select parts

W,A,S,D/Arrow keys to change direction of parts

Space/Enter to confirm direction
